84508.summary: Some customers in the Central Business District area of Saskatoon are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
84508.title: Nov 9 - Saskatoon (Central Business District) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)

84518.summary: Some customers in the Senator Buchanan & Staffordville areas of Lethbridge are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
84518.title: Nov 9 - Lethbridge (Senator Buchanan & Staffordville) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
